description: Builds your Android project with gradle.

opts.description: The root directory of your android project, for example, where your root build gradle file exist (also gradlew, settings.gradle, etc...)
opts.summary: The root directory of your android project, for example, where your root build gradle file exist (also gradlew, settings.gradle, etc...)
opts.title: Project Location

opts.description: Set the module that you want to build. To see your available modules please open your project in Android Studio and go in [Project Structure] and see the list on the left.
opts.summary: Set the module that you want to build. To see your available modules please open your project in Android Studio and go in [Project Structure] and see the list on the left.
opts.title: Module

opts.description: Set the variant that you want to build. To see your available variants please open your project in Android Studio and go in [Project Structure] -> variants section.
opts.summary: Set the variant that you want to build. To see your available variants please open your project in Android Studio and go in [Project Structure] -> variants section.
opts.title: Variant

opts.description: Set the build type that you want to build.
opts.summary: Set the build type that you want to build.
opts.title: Build type

opts.description:
Will find the APK or AAB files - `depending on the build type input` - with the given pattern.
Separate patters with a newline. **Note**
The step will export only the selected artifact type - `build type` - even if the filter would accept other artifact types as well.
opts.summary: Will find the APK or AAB files - `depending on the build type input` - with the given pattern.
opts.title: App artifact (.apk, .aab) location pattern

opts.description:
`all` - will cache build cache and dependencies
`only_deps` - will cache dependencies only
`none` - will not cache anything
opts.title: Set the level of cache

opts.description: Extra arguments passed to the gradle task
opts.summary: Extra arguments passed to the gradle task
opts.title: Additional Gradle Arguments

opts.description:
This input is **DEPRECATED** - use the App location pattern input instead
Will find the APK files with the given pattern.
opts.summary: This input is **DEPRECATED** - use the App location pattern input instead
opts.title: APK location pattern

opts.description:
This output will include the path of the generated APK
after filtering based on the filter inputs.
If the build generates more than one APK which fulfills the
filter inputs, this output will contain the last one's path.
opts.summary: Path of the generated (and copied) APK - after filtering.
opts.title: Path of the generated APK

opts.description:
This output will include the paths of the generated APKs
after filtering based on the filter inputs.
The paths are separated with `|` character, for example, `app-armeabi-v7a-debug.apk|app-mips-debug.apk|app-x86-debug.apk`
opts.summary: List of the generated (and copied) APK paths - after filtering.
opts.title: List of the generated APK paths

opts.description:
This output will include the path of the generated AAB
after filtering based on the filter inputs.
If the build generates more than one AAB which fulfills the
filter inputs, this output will contain the last one's path.
opts.summary: Path of the generated (and copied) AAB - after filtering.
opts.title: Path of the generated AAB

opts.description:
This output will include the paths of the generated AABs
after filtering based on the filter inputs.
The paths are separated with `|` character, for example, `app--debug.aab|app-mips-debug.aab`
opts.summary: List of the generated (and copied) AAB paths - after filtering.
opts.title: List of the generated AAB paths

opts.description:
This output will include the path of the generated mapping.txt.
If more than one mapping.txt exist in the project, this output will contain the last one's path.
opts.summary: Path of the generated (and copied) mapping.txt.
opts.title: Path of the generated mapping.txt
